translations: v.移居外国，移民；迫使（或帮助）……移居外国

phrs.translation: 永久移居国外, 移居国外, 移民
移居, 永久移居国外, 移出

sentences.sentence: The men emigrate to work as seamen.
sentences.translation: 这些男人移居国外当海员。

sentences.sentence: Everybody was flabbergasted when I announced I was going to emigrate to Australia.
sentences.translation: 当我宣布要移民去澳大利亚时，所有人都惊呆了。

sentences.sentence: Certain formalities have to be gone through before you can emigrate.
sentences.translation: 必须办理一定的手续方能移居他国。
